title: The Calm Before the Streaming-Wars Storm, Plus ‘High Flying Bird’ | The Watch (Ep. 327)
description:
FX CEO John Landgraf gave his semi-annual state of television address this week (2:19) and took digs at Netflix while doing so (13:24). Steven Soderbergh’s new movie, ‘High Flying Bird,’ is his most emotionally present work to date (33:21).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Guest: Adam Nayman

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
